Councilperson at Large Place B

Jesse Paul Sanchez is a dedicated public servant and experienced business owner currently serving as City Councilman at Large, Place B, for the City of Del Rio since 2020. As President of J.P. Sanchez Construction Company, Inc., founded in 1983, he brings over four decades of expertise in building construction, project management, and fiscal responsibility. His leadership has expanded the companyâ€™s commercial capacity and increased its bonding capability to over $20 million.
